divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the television programme "Yesterday at Wimbledon" on channel BBC2. TV presenter John Inverdale was interviewing Tennis celebrity John McEnroe, both men were sitting down facing one another. When the camera viewed them both from the side a glowing object could be seen in the sky over John McEnroe, some distance way. The camera operator viewed the object twice, but; the third time the camera viewed the men; the camera operator had zooomed in to avoid filming the object. Which indicates that the camera operator was aware of the UFO. The object appeared to be hovering. I thought the object was maybe a helicopter.
trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around June 24th 2008
